sentences.english: "I am driven to further my career toward peace and understanding among all people, " said Manuel.
sentences.chinese: 我渴望今後能以推動全人類的和平與瞭解爲職志。

sentences.english: We are committed to excellence in providing Christian education which develops the whole person.
sentences.chinese: 我們以提供卓越的基督教教育爲職志。
